mapper.select: select distinct t2.id, t2.file_group_name as fileGroupName, t2.create_time as createTime, t2.creator, t2.`status` from tb_sys_permission_files t1 , tb_sys_file_group t2 where t1.file_group_id = t2.id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t1.permission_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.file_group_name as fileGroupName, t.file_group_describe as fileGroupDescribe, t.create_time as createTime, t.creator, t.`status` from tb_sys_file_group t left join (select DISTINCT t1.id,t1.file_group_name from tb_sys_file_group t1,tb_sys_permission_files t2 where t1.id = t2.file_group_id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t2.permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) tt on t.id = tt.id where t.`status` = '1' and tt.id is null
and t.file_group_name like CONCAT('%', #{fileGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
